wichita.neighborhoods: Downtown, Delano, College Hill, Riverside, Old Town, Planeview
wichita.meetingHighlights: Large central meetings and neighborhood groups with strong outreach programs and regular speaker meetings.
wichita.transitInfo: Wichita Transit provides local bus services; Wichita Dwight D. Eisenhower National Airport (ICT) serves regional flights.

topeka.neighborhoods: Downtown, West Topeka, Potwin, North Topeka
topeka.meetingHighlights: Capital-city meetings with steady weekday and evening attendance; several faith-based groups host regular meetings.
topeka.transitInfo: Topeka Metro provides local bus service; nearby airports and I-70 provide regional access.

overland-park.neighborhoods: Downtown Overland Park, College Boulevard, Oak Park
overland-park.meetingHighlights: Suburban meetings that draw attendees from the greater Kansas City area with many evening and family-friendly groups.
overland-park.transitInfo: Johnson County Transit and regional bus routes; close to Kansas City International Airport (MCI).

kansas-city-ks.areaDescription: Kansas City, Kansas (part of KC metro)
kansas-city-ks.neighborhoods: Downtown KCK, Strawberry Hill, Armourdale, Argentine
kansas-city-ks.meetingHighlights: Urban meetings with a wide range of formats and strong cross-state collaboration with Kansas City, MO groups.
kansas-city-ks.transitInfo: RideKC buses and regional transit connect to Kansas City, MO; Kansas City International Airport nearby.

lawrence.meetingHighlights: University-influenced meeting schedule with strong student and community participation and varied meeting formats.
lawrence.transitInfo: Lawrence Transit provides local routes; easy access to I-70 and the Kansas City metro.

olathe.neighborhoods: Downtown Olathe, Prairie Center, Cedar Creek, Indian Creek
olathe.meetingHighlights: Growing suburban meetings with family-friendly schedules; many evening and weekend groups serving the KC metro area.
olathe.transitInfo: Johnson County Transit and regional bus routes; close to Kansas City International Airport (MCI).
